registrationNumber.description: The Registration Number that uniquely identifies the registration.

baseRegistrationNumber.description: For changes, admendments, discharges, and renewals the Registration Number for the Financing Statement that the change/amendment applies to. For a Financing Statement it is identical to the registration number.

statusType.description:
The status of the Financing Statement. One of
  • ACT - Active
  • HDC - Historical Discharged
  • HEX - Historical Expired

registrationType.description: One of the defined Financing Statement registration types.

registrationDescription.description: A description of the registration type, generated by the PPR system and returned in the response.

registrationClass.description: One of the defined Financing Statement registration classes.

path.description: The relative path for a GET request to retrieve an individual registration of either a Financing Statement or a change to a Financing Statement.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the PPR system, the date and time the registration is created.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: Generated by the PPR system, the date and time the of the most recent draft update. When the draft is created it is identical to createDateTime.

expireDays.description: The number of days before the Financing Statement expires. The value is -99 for an infinite registration with no expiry date.

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with the registration. Provided to facilitate client tracking of PPR activity.

securedParties.description: The names of one or more of the registration Secured Parties.

registeringName.description: The name of the person who submitted the draft request in the format first name last name.

inUserList.description: True if the base registration is already included in the account registrations list.
